name: Ice Ice Meow 2 - Let's kick some ice!
name_original: Ice Ice Meow 2 - Let's kick some ice!
description:
Some instructions:

left right arrow keys: walk

down arrow key: move through platforms

up arrow key: jump

c: big jump (spents one jump point, amount is shown on the screen on the top right)

You gain one jump point by collecting food or advancing a round.

(I found some bugs which can cause you to spent more jump points than intended, for example don't press up while pressing c)

In the first round the only way to lose is to fall into the ice sea.

There are two high scores, one is for food collected and the other for rounds passed.

You can gain additional food score (but no additional jump points) in two ways.

Each time you pass a round an event will happen and something will change. The changes may affect many parts of the game, are permanent and will most likely make it more difficult. Almost always you will get some food score.

Starting from the second round, a question mark on the left side will appear. If you touch it you can get additional food score but another temporary change event will happen. In some ways question marks can also appear elsewhere on the map. If you touch them you will always get teleported back to the beginning and don't advance a round but they stack indefinitely.  Be cautious as some of these changes can be very risky.

Enjoy! Don't forget to post some additional events you'd like to see in the game!
